channel.title: PI chaotic Cross bow shooting from a distance
channel.description:
Hey mopar i was wondering if any one knows how to make the chaotic crossbow shoot from a distance?
Basically when i use the crossbow it runs to the npc/player and starts shooting but i wanna be able to shoot from like a fair distance like all my other crossbows do :S any help will be appreciated :D thanx

item.title: PI chaotic Cross bow shooting from a distance
item.dc:creator: @Nasz Nasz
item.description:
@Nasz wrote:

[quote=“Sagi, post:6, topic:394319”][quote author=hydravision link=topic=491506.msg3595300#msg3595300 date=1305009103]
ofc its in item.cfg otherwise it wouldnt spawn LMFAO!
[/quote]
It could be only spawned if it’s declared client sided in ItemDef.java :facepalm: and Item.cfg isn’t necessary for it to be spawned. Check ItemAssistant.java or something like that I can’t remember.[/quote]

Thumbz up :rolleyes:

Read full topic
item.source: PI chaotic Cross bow shooting from a distance

item.title: PI chaotic Cross bow shooting from a distance
item.dc:creator: @Sagi Sagi
item.description:
@Sagi wrote:

Make sure you have the chaotic c’bow added in item.cfg and then it should become a range weapon.

Read full topic

[quote=“hydravision, post:1, topic:394319”]Hey mopar i was wondering if any one knows how to make the chaotic crossbow shoot from a distance?

Basically when i use the crossbow it runs to the npc/player and starts shooting but i wanna be able to shoot from like a fair distance like all my other crossbows do :S any help will be appreciated thanx[/quote]make sure it is considered a range weapon, this can be done by going to player.java
